message: This offer aims to provide a fair split considering the inflation risk. I propose we divide the money 3:1 in favor of Bob to account for potential loss in value.

I'm taking a risk with this offer, but I believe that it's in my best interest to take as much as possible now, before the inflation eats away at our potential gains. I'm willing to negotiate, but I'm not going to offer you more than this. If you reject this offer, you'll be taking a big gamble.
